title: "Counter Play"
body:
It's interesting how when Rito decided to rework Veigar they used the fact that his E had no counter play to it, but you've got to be kidding me with how much counterplayless things exist in the same likeness.

Apparently i couldn't counter play the old Veigar stun but i can counterplay an Annie tibber's or a skarner ult?

This may be a rant brought on by vsing an ashe mid with a skarner jungle who always came mid and ult'd me, but seriously, what fucking counter play exists here that apparently didn't for veigar?

Like Annie tibber's is 10 times easier to hit, yet Veigar is the one that gets reworked over the bitch that can get off 2 AoE stuns within 5 seconds.

Please someone from rito inform me what counterplay exists for Skarner and Annie.
